title: I received a pizza with dead insects inside from Domino's. They apologized and promised to credit some points to my account. Do you think this is fair or should I proceed with other necessary actions? If so, please guide me.
comments:
What are other options? 

Like full money back & a fresh pizza? That would be a minimum for me.
Sure, I will ask for a full refund.
